data.text: @kentindell Most of these are Excel spreadsheet based solutions - the whole thing is a farce.
@kentindell Booking covid test was terrible experience. Which company do you trust  with your personal data?
@kirschly @kentindell I always name directories that I want to sort alphabetically ahead of everything else starting with underscore. works on win and mac
@odtorson @kentindell Well, in terms of Macs, at least Swift doesn't: [" #", "##", "AB", "_#", "_A"]
@kirschly @kentindell I dont think so — _A sorts before A at least in the file manager

Yeah, I’m gonna guess “no” here. Britain is mirroring Russia in so many ways. I wouldn’t be surprised if one day it invaded a weaker bordering country.

(Hey Ireland, here’s a top tip: get yourself some anti-tank missiles - you only need 148)
@odtorson @kentindell I'd expect ASCII order, but maybe.
@kirschly @kentindell _!_! - the company formerly known as VAT EXPERTS. does underscore sort like space by the way? on the mac it seems

Has HMRC vetted these companies to check if any founders have criminal records for fraud? Will they accept liability for the consequences of highly sensitive company accounting information falling into the hands of criminals?
